code: export var QUERY_ALL_COMPETITION_BY_TOURNAMENT_ID_SUCCESS='QUERY_ALL_COMPETITION_BY_TOURNAMENT_ID_SUCCESS';export var ADD_A_COMPETITION_SUCCESS='ADD_A_COMPETITION_SUCCESS';export var ADD_A_COMPETITION_FAILED='ADD_A_COMPETITION_FAILED';export var QUERY_ALL_COMPETITION_BY_TOURNAMENT_ID_FAILED='QUERY_ALL_COMPETITION_BY_TOURNAMENT_ID_FAILED';export var CREATE_A_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING_SUCCESS='CREATE_A_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING_SUCCESS';export var CREATE_A_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING_FAILED='CREATE_A_FINAL_STAGE_SETTING_FAILED';export var CREATE_A_GROUP_STAGE_SETTING_SUCCESS='CREATE_A_GROUP_STAGE_SETTING_SUCCESS';export var CREATE_A_GROUP_STAGE_SETTING_FAILED='CREATE_A_GROUP_STAGE_SETTING_FAILED';export function AllCompetitionByTournamentId(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:null;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case QUERY_ALL_COMPETITION_BY_TOURNAMENT_ID_SUCCESS:return action.payload;case QUERY_ALL_COMPETITION_BY_TOURNAMENT_ID_FAILED:return null;default:return state;}}export function NewCompetition(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:null;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ADD_A_COMPETITION_SUCCESS:return action.payload;case ADD_A_COMPETITION_FAILED:return null;default:return state;}}
